lead_paragraph: The blogger was sentenced to five years in prison, and his assistant to three years, after a court ruled that they were guilty of abuses of their freedom and infringements upon state interests.

headline.print_headline: Asia; Vietnam: 2 Sentenced Over Blog Posts

snippet: The blogger was sentenced to five years in prison, and his assistant to three years, after a court ruled that they were guilty of abuses of their freedom and infringements upon state interests.
abstract: Vietnam court gives five-year sentence to political blogger Nguyen Huu Vinh and three years to his assistant Nguyen Thi Minh Thuy for posts deemed to infringe upon state interests.
